merata kamkaruwan wenuwen athiwishala sewawak karannata hethema katayuthu kele ya.anathuruwa dhiwara amathyawaraya lesa merata aarthikaya nanwamin dhiwara janathawage suba siddhiya udesa athiwishala mehewarak itu kele ya.2001 di podu peramunu aanduwa parajaya wimen anathuruwa wipakshaye pradhana sanwidhayaka waraya lesath anathuruwa wipaksha nayakawaraya lesath balaya godananga ganima sandaha wishala wehesak darannata wiya.eksath jathika paksha aanduwe mardanakari wadapiliwelata erehiwa janaghosha namin wirodhatha wyaparaya diyath kele me wakawanuwe di ya.2004 ape‡∑äral 01 wani dina pawathi maha mathiwaranaye di hambanthota disthrikkayen manapa ek laksha hath dahas hayasiya thunak laba ganimin parlimenthuwata theri path wu mahinda rajapaksha mathithuma agramathyawaraya menma maha marga amathyawaraya washayen da theri path wiya.gaurawaniya samayak udakaradi aluth shri lankawak goda nangana bawata porondu wu mahinda rajapaksha mathithuma 2005 janadhipathiwaranayen jayagrahanaya kele me ratata aadaraya karana janathawage aashirwadaya madhyaye ya.thama prathama dhura kalaya awasan wannata maththen me rata aluth shri lankawak bawata path kirima sandaha denu labu prathignyawa thama dhura kalaya awasan wimatath maththen uda kirima me rate janathawa labu jayagrahanayaki..

mulma indiyanu chithrapataya raja harishchandra nipadawa ee wana wita wasara 14 k gatha wuwada indiyanu sinama karmanthaya goda nagennata patan aran wasara dahayak wath harihati gewi natha.palke siya mulma pilithura lesa dakwa sitinuye ee wana wita indiyanu sinamawe thathwaya yahapath nowana bawaki.ehi karmika thathwaya ho nalu niliyange ranganaya pilibanda ho anthargathaya ho pilibanda thaman kisiseth sahimakata path nowana bawaya.eyata piliyama lesa ohu illa pawasanne sinamawa igena gannata indiyawata pasalak awashya bawaya.emenma ee wana wita pawathina sinamawa minisunge aakalpa narak karannak baw ohu pawasayi.

meyata perada pasuda balaya allahtama ayathwe.

ana helikala ayurin age nawa yowun awadhiya gewune thama aabadhitha piyata uwatan kirimatayi.aya thama piyata dadiwa aadaraya kala athara wareka ayata meya karadarakari kriyawak yayi ayata haguni.thama piya ikmanin miyayanawanam hodayayi wareka sithuni.thawath wareka mema adahasa itha waradakari hagimak yayi sithamin aathma awaladayaka yeduni.me athara aya thama piyata aahara kawamin sitiyadi aahara sirawi ohu miya giyaha.eyinpasu mema roga thathwayan ayata urumawiya.mewani aabadha foyid wisin wighatana aabadha lesa hadunwanu labuweya.mema siddhi adhyanaya ana oo namin namkaleya.mema adhyanayen pasuwa thawaduratath paryeshanaya kala mbaahu mema roga mulayanta hethuwa yatapathwu lingika aashayan bawa prathyashakara gaththeya.maya rogaya yanu sharirika aabadha nisa hatagannak nowa manasika hethumatha enam yatapath wu lingika aashayan nisabawa ohu dakwiya.
